G. 6, 35</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">nox jam adpetebat,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:8:38" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 8, 38</bibl></cit>; so <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:5:44" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 5, 44</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:10:42" default="NO" valid="yes">10, 42</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">tempus anni,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:34:13" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 34, 13</bibl></cit>; so <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:22:1" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 22, 1</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:29:10 al" default="NO" valid="yes">29, 10 al.</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">lux,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,005:4:51 al" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> A. 4, 51 al.</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">partitudo cui appetit,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0119,003:1:1:36" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plaut.</author> Aul. 1, 1, 36</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">consularia comitia adpetebant,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:41:28" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 41, 28</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">adpetit finis,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1014,001:Cons. ad Marc. 23" default="NO"><author>Sen.</author> Cons. ad Marc. 23 <hi rend="ital">fin.</hi></bibl></cit>— Hence, <orth extent="full" lang="la">appĕtens</orth> (<orth type="alt" extent="full" lang="la">adp-</orth>), <itype>entis</itype>, <pos>P. a.</pos> (acc. to II.); pr. <hi rend="ital">striving</hi> passionately <hi rend="ital">after</hi> something; hence, </sense><sense id="n3152.6" n="A" level="2"> In gen., <hi rend="ital">desirous of</hi>, <hi rend="ital">eager for;</hi> constr. with <hi rend="ital">gen.</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">appetens gloriae atque avidus laudis,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,009:chapter=3" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> Imp. Pomp. 3</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">nihil est adpetentius similium sui,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,052:14:50" default="NO"><author>id.</author> Lael. 14, 50</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">studiosissimi adpetentissimique honestatis,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,049:2:24:58" default="NO"><author>id.</author> Tusc. 2, 24, 58</bibl></cit>; so <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0631,001:C. 5:4" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Sall.</author> C. 5, 4</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0631,001:J. 7:1" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> J. 7, 1</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:31:69" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 31, 6, 36, § 69</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">turbidi et negotiorum adpetentes,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,005:14:57" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> A. 14, 57</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,004:1:49" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> H. 1, 49</bibl>; <bibl default="NO">3, 39</bibl>; <bibl default="NO">4, 6</bibl>; 4, 83; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1254,001:16:3" default="NO"><author>Gell.</author> 16, 3</bibl>.— </sense><sense id="n3152.7" n="B" level="2"> Esp., <hi rend="ital">eager for money</hi> (cf. abundans), <hi rend="ital">avaricious</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">homo non cupidus neque appetens,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,011:2:8" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> Agr. 2, 8</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">grati animi, non appetentis, non avidi signa,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,037:2:43:182" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> de Or. 2, 43, 182</bibl></cit>.—<hi rend="ital">Adv.</hi>: <orth extent="full" lang="la">appĕtenter</orth> (<orth type="alt" extent="full" lang="la">adp-</orth>), <hi rend="ital">eagerly</hi>, <hi rend="ital">in a grasping spirit</hi> or <hi rend="ital">manner</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">ne cupide quid agerent, ne adpetenter,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,055:1:10:33" default="NO"><author>Cic.</author> Off. 1, 10, 33</bibl></cit>; <bibl default="NO"><author>App.</author> M. 7, p. 192, 40</bibl> Elm.—<hi rend="ital">Comp.</hi> and <hi rend="ital">sup.</hi> not used.</sense></entryFree>
